dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3051 IH: Background Check Completion Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clyburn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To eliminate the requirement that a firearms dealer transfer a firearm if the national instant criminal background check system has been unable to complete a background check of the prospective transferee within 3 business days.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Background Check Completion Act.

section.header: Elimination of requirement that a firearms dealer transfer a firearm if the national instant criminal background check system has been unable to complete a background check of the prospective transferee within 3 business days
section.text: Section 922(t)(1)(B) of title 18, United States Code, is amendedâ€”
